page.title: 13ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES
page.content: When we did our survey we found that most people had{televisions}and they used this appliance most.All people had a{telephone}and most had a{washing {machine. We gave out twenty one leaflets and found out that everybody had at least three appliances.All the bigger houses had more appliances than the smaller houses. We also found that older people did not have the things the younger people had ,for example{,computers, {stereos, microwaves}and{dishwashers. The longest time somebody had had an appliance (a television) was thirty nine years.
